<b>Duco</b> -<b>is</b>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; guiar, ou trazer, ou levar guiando, governar <br> <b>2</b> &ensp; <small>ponitur etiam pro Aestimare, judicare, vel existimare</small> </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>X</b><br>commodi sui rationem ducere &ensp; <small>attentar para seu commodo</small> <br> ducere bellum &ensp; <small><small>Apud Virg</small></small> &ensp; <small>fazer guerra</small> <br> ducere funera &ensp; <small><small>Apud Virg</small></small> &ensp; <small>levar a enterrar</small> <br> ducere muros &ensp; <small><small>Apud Virg</small></small> &ensp; <small>levantar muros</small> <br> ducere se &ensp; <small><small>i, latenter abire, & discedere</small></small> <br> ducere somnos &ensp; <small><small>Apud Virg</small></small> &ensp; <small>dormir</small> <br> hic scholasticus ducit classem suam &ensp; <small>este estudante he decuriaõ</small> <br> honore, uel gloria duci &ensp; <small>levar se de honra, ou deleitar se com a honra, etc</small> <br> nemo id tibi uitio ducit &ensp; <small>ninguem vos interpreta, ou attribue isto a vicio</small> <br> quid ducis uultus? &ensp; <small>Porque fazeis carrancas?</small> <br> statuam ducere &ensp; <small>fundir a estatua</small> <br> uua ducit colorem &ensp; <small>pinta a uva</small> </p>
